select count(1) from logger
(fmail like '%${ftmail}%' or tmail like '%${ftmail}%' )
and title like '%${title}%'
and types = #{types} and (types = '收信' or types = '发信')
and time >= #{times} and time <= #{timex}
(types like '%登录%' or types like '%退出%') and username like '%${username}%'
types = '管理员登录' and username like '%${username}%'
types != '管理员登录' and types != '用户登录' and types != '安全退出' and types != '收信' and types != '发信'

select count(1) from (select 1 from logger
types = '用户登录' and time >= #{time} and (To_Days(date_format(now(),'%Y-%c-%d'))-To_Days(date_format(time,'%Y-%c-%d')) <= #{day})
group by username )a

select count(*) from (select count(*) from email_send
where To_Days(date_format(#{startTime},'%Y-%c-%d')) <= To_Days(date_format(time,'%Y-%c-%d'))
